full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA DNGOS 'GRUB ZHU BA'I PHYIR SMYU GUR DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG LCAM LA DGYES GUR MCHOD PA THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I DBYAR GYI RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA @005B 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DGE TSUL SBYIN PA SHES RAB BSKUL BA'I NGOR SLOB MA 'DI NYID KYI NGOR, GRUB CHEN KU KU RU BTZA'I SKYE DNGOS SU BIKshU BADZRA MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS SO, ,)
